alert.note: Alert for Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Paulding, northern Haralson and southwestern Polk Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Felton, or 7 miles northwest of Buchanan, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Tallapoosa, Draketown, Felton, Eubank Lake, Esom Hill and Antioch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
